mainText:
**Promo:**Bank of Entitlement: Where your entitlement is our top priority! Get ready to experience banking like never before.

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strolling into Bank of Entitlement, where I'm the big shot CEO. As I sauntered in, the teller had the audacity to ask me to wait in line like a mere mortal! Can you believe it? Me, Hot Josh, waiting like some peasant? I promptly demanded to speak to the manager, who apologized profusely and escorted me to a private lounge where I conducted my banking business in luxury. Who needs lines when you're the epitome of entitlement, am I right?
